lead_paragraph: Pennsylvania State University plans a special commemoration later this month marking the 50th anniversary of the late Joe Paterno's first game as head football coach, the school said on Thursday, nearly five years after he was fired over a child sex abuse scandal.

headline.print_headline: Penn State to Honor Late Coach Paterno Five Years After Scandal
headline.main: Penn State to Honor Late Coach Paterno Five Years After Scandal
